column1: ke eng ntho ee mme aetholang
ke eng ntho ee mme aetholang
basadi tlisa dieta tsena tsa ngwaneso
ure uapanyapanya ekaba kelefa moro wa tadi
helang basadi ha ubatle ha kebua le wena
a e qhalane le wena mololo
matsoho a ha uahlakola ke eng ha uqeta hoja
ee tsamaya hobeha bolpene eno ya batho
oitse ho nna oapanyapanya keofa moro wa tadi
